Class# HKUserAnnotatedMedicationType

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
class HKUserAnnotatedMedicationType
```

## [Overview](/documentation/HealthKit/HKUserAnnotatedMedicationType#overview)

Represents the set of authorizeable HKUserAnnotatedMedications.
